title: What did J. Lew say in Spanish during the Bayden opening?
subtitle: Although some did not understand the words of Jennifer Lopez, it was probably a familiar message to them.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Jennifer Lopez said, "One nation, under God's rule, is indivisible, with freedom and justice for all" in Spanish during its delivery, "This land is our land" in the inauguration of American President Joe Biden.
